commit message: section about building the productive version in readme
put more transaction statistics into reported application info
fix IllegalArgumentException when trying to import badly padded data
check for alert conditions really only once per WalletActivity start, rather than also on re-creations
also collect and report exceptions that happen when requesting version
do not keep alive connection for version request
fix corrupt wallet when receiving coins with invalid from address
fix ExchangeRateLoader can miss change of exchange currency while stopped
clickable indicator for local wallet balance
derive default local currency from default locale
